inn1.comm: Aamer bowls his first delivery in one-dayers, on Tharanga's pads and the batsman glances it down to fine leg
better line this time, on offstump, length delivery, Jayasuriya defends back towards the bowler
overpitched on the pads, Jayasuriya turns it down to fine leg to get off the mark
a corker from Aamer, he's got wickets in his first over in both Twenty20s and Tests, almost got one here as well, on offstump, back of a length and moving away a touch and Tharanga is beaten
similar length, Tharanga defends off the back foot towards point
Tharanga is struck on the thigh pad, Aamer appeals but that one looked to be sliding down leg as well, easy decision for umpire Asoka de Silva
Razzaq's return to one-day cricket starts with a wide down the leg side
dropped, again on the leg stump, it goes down the leg side, Akmal has to dive low to his right to take that, he fails to collect it, and his reaction suggests Jayasuriya had edged that
driven firmly to mid-off, takes a tight single, the fielder shies at the stumps, concedes an overthrow in the process
that took off from the back of a length, takes Jayasuriya by surprise, gets a thick outside edge which flies over the vacant second slip
on the pads to Tharanga, he looks to guide it fine down the leg side but doesn't get bat on it, it strikes his pads outside leg and goes on to the keeper
a bit of width for Tharanga, carved towards backward point where Fawad Alam does the fielding
lovely delivery to end the over from Razzaq, angling across Tharanga, who is beaten as he goes for a front-foot off drive
138.4 kmh, on middle and leg stump, Jayasuriya moves across to glance it to fine leg but is struck on the thigh pad
length ball just outside off, Tharanga gets forward and defends with bat and pad close toegther
back of a length this time, some extra bounce again, Tharanga gets on the back foot and opens the face to guide it to backward point
great line again from Aamer, just outside off, Tharanga is beaten again as he looks to defend
on middle and leg, length delivery, Tharanga walks across and plays a wristy shot towards backward square leg
shortish delivery, on off, Tharanga tips it towards mid-on, and the batsmen sprint through for a single
Razzaq keeps it tight around off, Tharanga gets on the back foot and slices it towards point
length ball on middle and leg, defended watchfully back down the pitch
on middle and off, back of a length, Tahranga pushes it towards wide mid-on for a single
length delivery angling into off stump, Jayasuriya turns it towards square leg
slightly wider from Razzaq, Jayasuriya takes a big stride forward and dabs it towards cover for a single
back of a length, on middle and leg, Jayasuriya is pinned ot the back foot by the bounce, he blocks it back down the pitch
Aamer starts the over with a sharp bouncer, too much down leg for the umpire's liking
reverts to offstump line, on a length and defended back towards the bowler
another loose waft from Tharanga, not foot work as he looks to drive through the off side, he is beaten
Aamer continues to trouble Tharanga, just a bit of movement away from the left-hander after pitching on a length outside off, Tharanga is beaten as he looks to defend
lbw appeal, but that struck Tharanga pretty high, mi9ght have been a bit of bat involved as well
gets on the back foot and steers the ball towards third man to get off the strike

half-volley on middle and leg, Jayasuriya swings it away towards midwicket, not too well-timed but the batsman have enough time to run four, not the most common of sights that, that too in a one-dayer
short delivery just outside off, Tharanga moves towards leg to make some space and crunches it past point for a boundary
back of a length on offstump this time, driven towards mid-on, not very well timed, Gul does the fielding
defended firmly towards cover off the front foot, Jayasuriya wanted the single but Tharanga sends him back
length ball on the pads, Tharanga turns it down to fine leg for a single, Tharanga will be unhappy at having missed out on getting more runs off that

Razzaq drops an absolute sitter, Jayasuriya gets a leading edge as he looks to flick, the ball balloons in the air and was the easiest of chances for Razzaq, who had plenty of time to get well in place, but can't hang on to it, you expect better at this level
played to square leg, batsmen think of a single but decide against it
cut towards point off the back foot, Fawad Alam does well to field it at point
turned towards square leg for a single
Jayasuriya is struck on the thigh pad, that ball would definitely have gine over the stumps
angling into Jayasuriya, who moves across and glances it to fine leg
length ball outside off, Tharanga swings at it and misses
good ball to end the over, cramping up Tharanga, he defends it back to the bowler
played with soft hands towards the leg side, the batsmen set off immediately for the run and get it comfortably
angling across Tharanga,he is beaten as he tries to defend, Akmal doesn't collect the ball cleanly and gives away a bye
hit on the pads outside leg stump, the ball dribbles towards square leg, batsmen jog through for a single
fuller length delivery outside off, Tharanga drives it to mid wicket
back of a length ball, blocked towards mid-off, Jayasuriya had to hurry after calling for the single
length ball on leg stump, Tharanga checks his on-drive, the ball rolls back towards the bowler
Jayasuriya punches Gul's first delivery past extra cover, not too much power behind that and it's a close race between Youni and the ball, the ball just wins

Gul strikes with his second delivery, Jayasuriya is gone, not the greatest of deliveries, short and wide, Jayasuriya has both feet off the ground as he cuts the ball, a bit of a top edge, straight to Mohammad Aamer at third man
Tharanga is beaten as he looks to defend, the ball was just outside off and moving away
overpitched on the pads, whipped away to square leg, more appalling fielding from Razzaq, he fails to make a simple stop at square leg, gives away two extra runs
Sangakkara defends his first ball with soft hands towards point, gets off the mark with a sharp single
lovely delivery, again some away movement for Gul, Tharanga is beaten yet again, how long before he nicks one of those?
length ball on middle and off, Sangakkara gets behind the line and taps the ball towards mid-on, another quick single
pushed firmly toward mid-off off the front foot
on the pads this time, Tharanga works it to square leg, another dot ball
more leg-stump offerings, whipped towards deep backward square leg by Tharanga
length ball well outside off, Tharanga does gets a thick outside edge this time as he looks to drive, doesn't carry to Misbah at slip
length ball on off, defended towards mid-on off the front foot
back of a length ball on offstump, climbing on Sangakkara, who does well to keep the ball down, played towards point
that kept a touch low, back of a length ball didn't get more than knee high, Sangakkara was on the back foot, he adjust late as he defends
no foot work from Sangakkara but superb timing as he carves a wide delivery outside off through covers, the outfield is pretty slow so the ball doesn't make it to the boundary
back of a length ball on leg stump, Tharanga stands tall as he defends towards point
the bouncer is way over the batsman's head, Gul will have to re-bowl that one
back of length ball on offstump, chopped past a diving Fawad Alam at backward point
Sangakkara takes a couple of paces down the pitch just before Gul releases the ball, he pushes the ball down the ground and races through for a single
length ball on middle, Sangakkara nudged behind square leg for a single
back of a legnth on middle and leg, Tharanga defends solidly down the pitch
similar delivery from Razzaq, similar response from Tharanga
finally Tharanga's troubled stay comes to an end, he had played and missed many times already and this time he gets the edge, a length ball just outside off, a thin edge through to the keeper
stylishly turned from outside off towards square leg by Jayawardene to get off the mark
solid forward defence from Jayawardene this time
back of a length on middle and off, Sangakkara shuffles across and whips it away towards wide mid-on
very wide outside off, just within the allowable limit, Sangakkara leaves that one to the keeper
Sangakkara shoulders arms to another one angling away from him

short of length ball on middle and leg, again Sangakkara walks across the stumps to punch it towards mid-on, misses and he is hit on the thigh pad, no question of an lbw as the ball was definitely going over the stumps
in the channel outside off, Sangakkara lifts the bat high over his head as he lets it go
poor delivery to end the over, fullish on middle and leg, Sangakkara dispatches that between the bowler and mid-on, nice, high elbow as he finishes the drive
straightaway he gets some extra bounce, Jayawardene is surprised as he looks to defend off the backfoot, bottom hand comes off as he manages to keep the ball down
short of length, just outside off, worked to square leg for a single
on the pads this time, Jayawardene dabs it towards square leg, very tight single, Sangakkara makes a full-length dive to make his ground, throw was wide anyway
another quick single, this time Sangakkara drops the ball towards the off side and sets off
length ball on offstump, Jayawardene gets forward and defends solidly to the off side
a bit of width, Jayawardene chops it towards point, too firmly to have time for a single
overpitched ball outside off, Sangakkara wanted to drive that through the off side, gets a thick inside edge  and the ball dribbles towards the leg side
fullish on middle, Sangakkara gets on the back foot and blocks back down the pitch
back of a length, just outside off, Sangakkara shoulders arms to that one
similar delivery from Gul, Sangakkara isn't interested in offering a shot to that one as well

Gul again spoils what had been a good over with a poor delivery, short and a bit of width, Sangakkara latches on it, crashes it through the covers, Afgridi gives chase but the ball beats him to the boundary
Gul bangs in the bouncer, Sangakkara responds with a pull but it is mistimed, the ball rolls towards square leg
turned away to fine leg for a single by Sangakkara
short and wide, Jayawardene cuts firmly towards deep point
superb fielding from Fawad Alam saves his team a run, Sangakkara carves a back of length ball towards the point boundary, Alam gives chase and a dive at the boundary keeps the batsmen to three
punched off the back foot towards cover
length ball draws Jayawardene onto the front foot, gets a bit of an outside edge towards backward point
short ball on off, pulled away by Jayawardene towards square leg
anotehr short ball, another pull, not too much power behind it, batsmen walk through for a single
back of a length just outside off, Jayawardene opens the face of the bat as he guides it towards backward point
Sangakkara drives firmly, but doesn't beat the fielder at cover
length ball just outside off, Sangakkara defends off the back foot
loose shot from Sangakkara, there was a bit of width for him, he looks to cut but misses
turned towards midwicket by Jayawardene
a bit of flight, Jayawardene steps across and whips the ball towards deep midwicket
Sangakkara gets on the front foot and defends cautiously towards the off side
length ball, pitching just outside off, driven firmly towards long-off
again Jayawardene steps across to play the ball from outside off to leg, straight towards the midwicket fielder
well outside off, Jayawardene looks to sweep, misses and is hit on the pad
glided off the backfoot towards backward point by Sangakkara
fullish on the pads, whipped by Sangakkara towards midwicket
Jayawarden looks to turn a middle stump ball towards midwicket, he i s hit high on the pads, muted appeal from Younis
Jayawardene looks to cut an outside off delivery, extra bounce takes the ball well above his bat
big appeal from Younis, Jayawardene is hit low on the pad in front of leg stump, but the angle was taking the ball down the leg side
Sangakkara punches the ball towards mid-off off the back foot, calls for a tight single, a bit of confused calling before the batsmen decide to go for it, make it in time
driven firmly to mid-on for a single
Jayawardene rocks back to make some room and cuts the ball from offstump towards point
driven uppishly by Sangakkara, it's between cover and extra cover, no danger there
another single as Jayawardene paddle-sweeps from middle and off
Sangakkara keeps the strike rotating by playing the ball with soft hands towards mid-on
a bit of turn for Ajmal, Jayawardene works it to square leg, no run this time after a run of five singles
low full toss on leg stump, Sangakkara backs away and whips it past short midwicket for a boundary
short and wide this time, Sangakkara can't capitalise as he carves that one straight towards the deep point fielder
slightly overpitched on offstump, Jayawardene defended back down the pitch
Jayawardene gets on the front foot and flat bats it between the bowler and mid-on, ball bounces just inside the boundary
Jayawardene drives it down to long-on this time for a single
way down the leg side, this has been a great over for Sri Lanka
good ball to finish from Younis, angling across Sangakkara and beating him as he looks to defend
reverse-sweep from Jayawardene, almost falls over as he plays that, the ball is sent towards backward point
Sangakkara holes out to point, huge wicket for Ajmal, slower through the air and gets some turn there, Sangakkara looked to cut it over the infield but ends up giving an easy catch to Afridi
doosra from Ajmal, Kapugedera doesn't pick it up, he's beaten as he looks to defend
this time he turns it towards backward square leg for a single
Jayawardene nudges it towards midwicket
flatter and quicker from Ajmal, Jayawardene gets it away to square leg
starts with a shortish ball which Kapugedera defends towards the off side
this one is quicker, Kapugedera drives firmly to long-off
flighted delivery this time, Jayawardene gets forward and defends
a bit of width, more defense from Jayawrdene
driven down to long-off by Jayawardene
Kapugedera rounds off the over with another punch to long-off, all three runs in that over coming in the same region
doosra from ajmal again, Kapugedera gets on the front foot and blocks it
short and a bit of width, Kapugedera stays on the back foot and guides the ball behind backward point
length delivery, Jayawardene paddles it from way outside off stump, gets it very fine down leg
overpitched, Jayawardene clips it towards midwicket
Kapugedera lunges forward and gets a bit of an outside edge
driven firmly towards wide mid-on
on the pads, defended back to the bowler
a bit of width, cut powerfully but the fielder at backward point cuts it off
pushed towards cover off the front foot for a single
pitching on a length on off stump, Jayawardene glances it fine
straighter one from Afridi, gets an inside edge onto the pads
length ball just outside off, punched towards wide mid-off
on the pads, turned towards square leg
cautiously defended off the front foot by Kapugedera
overpitched on middle and leg, Kapugedera pushes it to long-on
leading edge as Jayawardene looks to work it to the leg side, luckily for the batsman it doesn't carry to the bowler
on middle stump, defended towards midwicket
fullish and on the pads, glanced to short fine leg, some confused calling before the batsmen decide against the single
Afridi strikes, Kapugedera drives away from his body at a length ball outside off, results in an outside edge which Akmal collects gleefully
appeal for lbw from Afridi, Samaraweera was looking to defend off the front foot, that was drifting down leg
way outside off, Samaraweera cuts it powerfully, but doesn't beat backward point
turned to short fine leg for a single
length ball pitching on offstump, Jayawardene defends towards midwicket and sets off for the single
a quick single is taken after working the ball from outside off towards backward square leg
overpitched on middle and off, Samaraweera drives to long-on for a single
Jayawardene does what he has been doing all innings, turning it form outside of behind square leg
another single, Samaraweera punches it towards long-on
overpitched, just outside off, driven down to long-on, batsmen walk through for yet another single
very full again from Ajmal, wide outside off this time, dug out towards backward point
fullish outside off, Samaraweera gets nicely on the front foot and punches it through the covers
nurdled towards square leg for another single
back of a length just outside off, inside edge onto the boot as he looked todrive off the back foot
full and wide, driven crisply, but placement is poor, it doesn't beat the man at cover
full and on off, squeezed out towards short third man
lovely timing from Samaraweera, the ball was on the pads, Samaraweera glanced it very fine to beat  the fielder at fine leg
short of length, in the channel outside off, played off the back foot towards backward point
again it is back of a length, coming into the batsman with the angle, defended towards the off side
defended solidly off the front foot as Razzaq keeps it tight around off stump
good stuff this from Razzaq, absolutely no room for Samaraweera, who can only block the ball back to the bowler
and again Razzaq gets it right, this time Samaraweera got on the front foot and tried to force the ball, inside edged towards mid-on
a little bit of width, Samaraweera dabs it towards backward point
flighted by Afridi, overpitched just outside off, driven towards mid-off
tossed up again, turned towards mid-on by Samaraweera
a touch shorter from Afridi, defended off the front foot by Jayawradene
more front foot defence from Jayawardene
a bit of width, Jayawardene chops it down towards backward point
gets the single this time, pushed towards mid-on off the back foot
short of a length and outside off, Jayawardene nearly nicks it to the keeper as he cuts, beaten by a whisker
takes a step out of the crease and blocks a length delivery back towards the bowler
back of a length and wide, eased towards deep point for a single
Samaraweera departs to a shot he wouldn't like to look at again, it was wide outside off and he looked to pull that one, was a bit early into the shot and spoons it to Younis at mid-on
Mathews was nearly dismissed first ball, short of length and just outside off, Mathews wanted to defend, gets a thick outside edge which lands just short of Misbah at wide slip
short and wide, Mathews shovels it towards midwicket to get off the mark
slower through the air from Afridi, Jayawardene defends cautiously off the front foot
rocks onto the back foot and crashes it towards backward point, doesn't beat the fielder
defended back towards the bowler
overpitched on middle and leg, driven down to long-on
tossed up and full, Mathews punches it towards mid-on
looked to whip it towards midwicket, but only manages to play it back down the pitch towards the bowler
Razzaq keeps plugging away around off, punched off the back foot towards mid-off

is that a run-out? Jayawardene was in trouble as he was coming back for the second, he's well out of his ground, but it remains to be seen whether the keeper has the ball in his hand as he broke the stumps, after several replays the third umpire is satisfied Akmal had the ball in his gloves and Jayawardene has to go, there was never two runs in that, the ball had barely made it past the inner circle near midwicket, Younis was onto it quickly and threw it to the right end, the keepers, and Sri Lanka are in big trouble now
short of length on offstump, Kulasekara gets behind the line and defends
keeps it back of a length just outside off, played with soft hands towards cover, tight single is taken
a wristy shot off the back foot, turned from outside off towards midwicket
shortish ball, well outside off, left alone by the batsman
chopped towards point, no chance of a run
full and outside off, punched towards cover
defended off the front foot back towards the bowler
appeal for lbw, that one turns into the batsman, Mathews got an inside edge onto his pads, was totally deceived by that quicker one, good decision from the umpire
more watchful forward defence
Mathews jumps onto the back foot and tries to whip it to midiwicket, edges it onto his pad
Razzaq into his last over, immaculate line again, just outside off , Kulasekara defends
on middle and leg, pulled towards midwicket, mistimed by Kulasekara, but enough on it to get a single
wristy shot takes the ball from outside off towards midwicket, takes an easy two
on the pads, easy run for Mathews, he pushes it towards square leg
Kulasekara opens the face of the bat to steer the ball towards third man, batsman walk through for a single
slow and short from Razzaq, rises only as high as the chest, swung away towards fine leg
wide outside off, carved past cover for a single
Kulasekara plants his front foot across the stumps and turns the ball behind square leg
cut away off the back foot towards deep backward point
gets well forwards as he defends a middle stump ball
tossed up by Afridi, driven through the covers
quicker, and full, heading for offstump, blocked by Kulasekara
pitching on middle, the turn takes the ball past leg stump, glanced by Mathews, poor fielding from Alam at fine leg gives away a boundary, the ball wasn't even travelling too fast when it got to Alam
defended towards midwicket off the backfoot
paddle sweep from outside off fetches him a single
Kulasekara shows the full face of the bat as he defends
width offered, Kulasekara guides the ball towards backward point for a single to retain the strike
good looking cut from Kulasekara, that was very wide outside off
great delivery from Gul, Mathews was squared by that one, gets an outside edge past the vacant slip region
gets the ball moving back into the batsman this time, the ball flies past the outside edge as Kulasekara looks to defend
length ball on offstump, solidly defended by Kulasekara this time
digs in the bouncer, about a foot outside off, the batsman gets out of the way easily
back of a length ball heading for offstump, Kulasekara blocks it back to the bowler
another wristy shot from Mathews, takes the ball from outside off and gets it towards wide mid-on
huge appeal for lbw, quicker ball from Ajmal, the batsman was hit very low on the pads but might have been just outside off, hard to give that one out
defended to the off side off the back foot
on offstump, playedto midwicket
short and wide Kulasekara goes for the cut but is beaten
turned towards square leg from off stump, just one run off the over
length ball just outside off, batsman opens the face of the bat to glide the ball towards point, 'No' is the call after he plays the shot
in the channel outside off, blocked back down the pitch
more watchful defence from Mathews, this time off the back foot
bouncer from Gul, quick and well-directed, Mathews was a couple of paces down the pitch, and had to evasive action, just about managed to
short ball again, pulled from offstump towards midwicket for a single
a yorker to end the over, line was just outside off, blocked by Kulasekara
pitching on a length outside off, opens the face to get it towards short third man
punched towards mid-on for a single
Kulasekara gets down the pitch and plays an inside-out off drive
appeal for lbw as Kulasekara is struck in front of middle, turn might have taken the ball down leg
defended off the front foot towards cover
jabbed towards short third man, not much room to play that shot
starts with a great delivery, cutting the batsman in half, pitched just outside off and nipped back in
angling across the batsman, left alone by Mathews
back of a length, turned from outside off towards square leg
back of a length delivery again, Mathews crunches it off the back foot towards long-off
length ball just outside off, driven firmly to extra cover off the front foot

Kulasekara went for the pull, the ball was shortish and angling across him, there was a sound as it went through to the keeper, umpire doesn't think it's bat, and he's right as well, it brushes the thigh pad
Mathews rocks back and crashes it through the covers, Afridi picks it up single-handedly near the boundary
nudged behind square leg for a single
doosra which pitched on leg stump, Kulasekara glances it fine
Mathews dabs it towards mid-on for a single
Kulasekara takes a couple of paces down the track and crashes it past extra cover for a boundary, good looking shot that
cautiously defended back towards the bowler this time
on the pads, worked towards square leg, it was big no-ball from Aamer, free-hit time
length ball on middle and leg, Kulasekara looks to mow it towards midwicket, edges onto his pad and the ball dribbles towards point
Mathews gets on the front foot and punches it towards mid-off for a quick single

Kulasekara departs as Razzaq hangs on to a skier, the batsman was looking to clear mid-off for a boundary, the ball goes high towards extra cover, Razzaq dropped a similar one earlier in the day but doesn't blow it this time
back of length on leg stump, hits the thigh pad and dribbles towards the off side, Mathews wants the single, the batsmen collide mid-pitch but they manage to make their ground
plays it inside-out towards point, picked off from middle stump
played with soft hands towards mid-on, Mathews screams for the single as he wants to keep the strike, he gets it comfortably
Mathews was backing away, Gul spots it and follows the batsman, Mathews can only block it back towards the bowler
yorker outside off this time from Gul, Mathews mistimes it back down the pitch
back of a length, on off stump, Mathews opens the face of the bat to get it away to backward point

Murali gets a boundary in typical fashion, a bouncer from Gul, Murali is ducking, backing away and swinging his bat at the same time, takes a top edge and the ball sails over short third man for a boundary
a more orthodox boundary this time from Murali, fullish ball Murali shows the full face of the bat as he hammers it to the long-on boundary

Murali keeps the runs flowing, three boundaries in a row now, this ball was a back of a length, a slower delivery, Murali crouched and swung his bat, connects well and the ball races away behind square leg for four
another boundary, a bit of width, Mathews rocks back and crunches it past cover
whipped towards long-on, mistimed and the ball just about rolls past the inner circle, Murali is back in a flash for a second
punched towards cover for a single
the ball comes into Murali, he adjust late to turn the ball towards midwicket
Mathews comes down the pitch and lofts the ball over extra cover for a boundary, great batting here from  Mathews
Mathews keeps the strike by punching the ball towards midwicket for a single
Mathews' innings comes to an end, caught and bowled, he was too early into his shot and only managed to lob it back to the bowler Aamer, who juggled it a few times before hanging on
length ball, wide outside off, bottom edged by Thushara towards point, Murali wants the single, Thushara responds
Murali backs away and lofts it over midwicket, Murali didn't quite get hold of it, Mohammad Yousuf has to run back in an effort to catch it, he can't reach before the ball lands
Murali looks for a trademark swipe, but is beaten by the slower ball
Murali shuffle away to make room and dabs the ball towards point for a single
fullish ball on offstump, good-looking drive from Tharanga, between mid-off and extra cover, Murali wanted the third but he is sent back
spinning away from Murali after pitching outside off, Murali chops it towards point
overpitched outside off, smashed past point for a boundary
this time he shows us he can play with a straight bat, back down the ground, Murali picks up two more
clobbered through the covers for a boundary this time, Murali on the rampage
two more for Murali, swiped to midwicket, this is turning into a very decent total for Sri Lanka
Murali backs away and dabs it to short third man for a single to keep the strike
Aamer ends the Murali show with a yorker which hits the base of offstump, Aamer has kept his head despite the glut of runs, good work from the youngster
Malinga shows the straight bat, and is early into the shot, the ball rolls towards the off side
Thushara joins in the fun, an overpitched ball on the pads, Thushara swings it past square leg for another boundary
yorker just outside off, squeezed out towards square leg
slightly slower from Aamer, on the pads, Malinga chips it over square leg, he calls for the second and gets it too
good yorker to end the innings, outside off, Malinga bottom edges it to the keeper, batsmen scamper a single, so Sri Lanka finish on 232

inn2.comm: swings in for Kulasekara, Akmal is hit on the pads in front of leg, Sri Lanka appeal but that was drifting down leg side
half-volley outside off, Akmal gets a big stride in as thrashes it between cover and point for a boundary
this ball nips back after pitching on a length outside off, pushed towards point by Akmal
overpitched just outside off, Akmal gets forward and punches it to extra cover
wide outside off, length delivery, guided towards third man by Akmal
back of length outside off, jags back in a bit, Malik shoulders arms to that one
starts with a length ball which moves away from Akmal, who swings at it and misses
getting the ball to swing away from the batsman, Akmal thought about chasing that one then opted out of the shot
fullish ball on leg, Akmal wanted to turn it to leg, gets the leading edge, which lobs over the bowler's head and land safely short of mid-off ,close call that
back of length ball, bit of width, Akmal stands tall and square drive gracefully for a boundary
Akmal flirting with danger again, the ball moves away after pitching on off, Akmal chases and misses
short of length on off, Akmal defends off the back foot
Kulasekara gets the ball to shape into the right-hand batsman, pitching on a length, Malik defends watchfully
Kulasekara's swing has Malik in serious trouble, swings sharply into him and strikes him on the pads, too much movement takes the ball down leg
this time Malik charges out and carves a full, wide ball over covers for a boundary
the ball darts back after pitching just outside off, Malik pushes it towards mid-on
Malik goes for the cut and he is beaten as the indipper comes close to his body
Kulasekara gets the ball to hold it's line this time, and the ball races past the outside edge
Akmal powers it on-the-up towards cover, placement is poor and doesn't beat the fielder
slower ball, 118kmh, low full toss, on middle, Akmal  picks it up and defends to the leg side
Malik is having a torrid time out here, the ball pitches in the channel outside off, and goes straight on, Malik plays for the incutter and is beaten again
wide outside off, Malik bends his knees and cuts the ball towards third man to get off the strike
shortish ball, on off, Akmal stands tall and blocks it back down the pitch
Malinga goes for the yorker, it ends up a touch shorter than he intended, Akmal pushes it towards mid-off
back of a length ball, coming into the batsman, Malik gets on the back foot and jabs it towards mid-on
yet again Kulasekara strikes the batsman on the pads, again in front of leg stump, again the umpire's not interested as the ball is going down
back of a length delivery, extravagant movement for Kulasekara, Akmal is cut in half as he looks to defend, inside-edge races past the keeper for four
much more confident from Akmal, defended to backward point
and this is a lovely cover drive, a half-volley outside off, Akmal makes sure he doesn't miss out
shortish ball outside off, Akmal jumps as he covers for the swing, gets it away towards mid-on
slower ball, 116.3 kmh, defended towards point off the back foot
this time it is Malinga who hits the batsman's pad in front of leg, again the umpire rules it not out as it's drifting down leg side
full ball just outside off, squeezed out towards third man, Murali races across and uses his foot to stop that
Malinga slips in the bouncer, Malik ducks under early
shortish slower ball, 120kmh, slices towards backward point, Kapugedera puts in a full-length dive to his left to stop it
yet another slower one, 123kmh, full and on the pads, jabbed towards mid-on
Kulasekara keeps pegging away at the offstump, Malik gets behind the line and defends it back down the pitch
length ball just outside off, Malik pushes it towards extra cover
short and wide outside off stump, no footwork from Malik as  he chases it, e misses
Malik is beaten again, this time he lunges forward to defend to the off side, the ball goes past  the outside edge

Kulasekara finally gets rid of Malik, who has looked completely out of touch here, this was just short of a length, pitching on off and holding it's line, Malik was look for the inward movement, the ball takes the off bail
length ball pitching just outside off, Afridi whips it to short fine leg where Malinga does the fielding
full and on the pads, tucked to midwicket by Akmal for a single
full toss on offstump, defended towards cover
short and on middle stump, Afridi defends awkwardly towards point
strays onto the pads, Afridi shuffles across and glances it fine for a boundary, Kulasekara makes a mess of the fielding after covering a lot of ground
bouncer on offstump from Malinga, Afridi spots it early and ducks under
full toss on the pads, Afridi clips it towards midwicket for a single
Afridi is struck high on the pads, as he looks to work it to the leg side, the ball dribbles towards backward point
full and wide, Afridi swings at it and doesn't connect
Afridi gets a thick outside edge as he seeks to whip it to midwicket, the ball scuttles towards point
pitching on a length and moving towards middle, Afridi moves across and turns it behind square leg
short and wide, Afridi looks to mow it towards the leg side, mistimes it towards mid-on
slower delivery, pitching on middle and heading down leg, Akmal is hit on the pads as he tries to whip it away

he strikes first ball, Akmal is cleaned up, no footwork at all from Akmal, back of a length ball, the batsman is stuck on the crease and the ball sneaks between bat and pad to crash into middle and off stumps
pitching on a length on offstump, Yousuf gets forward and defends
slightly fuller, same line from Thushara, Yousuf leans forward and blocks it
a bit of width for Yousuf, he defends it towards point
length ball heading for offstump, Yousuf taps it back down the pitch
strays onto the pads, Yousuf gets off the mark with a whip to the square leg boundary
slanting into leg stump, Afridi gets in the front foot and tucks it past midwicket, well timed shot by Afridi
way outside off stump, just within the legal limit, Yousuf offers no shot to that
slower ball which moves away from the right-hander, thsi one is much closer to off stump, Yousuf chases it but is beaten by the movement
overpitched outside off, Yousuf gets forward and defends confidently towards covers
an inside-edge saves Yousuf, takes the edge and goes on to hit him on the pad in front of off, a bit more movement and he was a goner
he's a goner this time, length ball outside off, moving away from Yousuf, who flirts with it and gets a nick to the keeper, superb spell of bowling from Kulasekara
overpitched on the pads, Afridi clips it behind square leg for a couple to bring up the fifty
quick delivery, angling across the batsman, Afridi looks to drive through the covers but is beaten
closer to the stumps this time, Afridi gets behind the line and defends it towards point
shortish ball on legstump, Afridi looks to pull it powerfully, mistimes it towards mid-on
Thushara keeps it tight around off, younis gets forward and defends towards cover
takes the inside half of the bat and rolls back towards the bowler as Younis looks to drive through the off
back of a length delivery heading for off stump, Afridi gets behind the line and taps it back down the pitch
slightly overpitched, outside off, Afridi looks to force it down the ground, mistimes it towards mid-off
back of a length and wide outside off, cut towards cover off the back foot
length ball, immaculate line from Kulasekara, Younis opens the face to steer the ball towards backward point
length ball outside off, Afridi turns it from outside off towards midwicket for a single
end of another tidy over, Younis stands tall and powers it towards cover, doesn't beat the fielder
length ball on offstump, Afridi shows the full face of the bat as he defends
back of a length ball on offstump, Afridi shuffles across and tucks it behind square leg for a single
Thushara keeps it around offstump, Younis jabs it towards point
Thushara drops it a touch short, Younis rocks back and chops it towards deep backward point
shortish ball outside off, Younis square drives it towards point
driven uppishly by Younis, it flies through the gap between short cover and mid-off, and races to the boundary
superb shot from Afridi, welcomes Malinga back with a six, it was a shortish ball outside off, Afridi hammers it over long-on
predictable reply from Malinga, slips in the bouncer, Afridi ducks under it
another short ball, doesn't rise as much as the previous one, it's on the leg stump, Afridi works it behind square leg
length ball on offstump, Younis punches it back to the bowler, who throws the ball back at the stumps
bouncer from Malinga, outside off stump, Younis isn't too concerned by that one
a yorker to end the over, dug out towards cover by Younis
on middle and leg, whipped down to long-on by Afridi
Younis gets his front pad across and clips the ball from outside off towards square leg
Afridi stays in the crease and prods it towards cover, sets off for the single but is sent back
massive appeal for lbw, ooh that was close, Afridi was struck on offstump, as he went for a sweep, lucky to survive
on-driven firmly for a single
this time long-off has to do the fielding as younis punches the ball off the front foot
overpictehd outside off, Younis goes after it, he misses the ball, there was a sound as the ball went past the bat but it was off the bat hitting ground
short of a length on off stump, driven off the back foot towards extra cover

an awful shot to get out, Afridi had looked in good touch till then, short and wide, Afridi has to reach across as he looks to dab it towards slip, can only feather it through to the keeper, Rameez Raja points out on TV that we would have praised it as a cheeky shot if he had pulled it off
back of a length on the pads, nudged towards square leg
overpitched outside off, Younis opens the face and steers the ball towards third man
a bit of width outside off, pushed off the front foot towards cover
length ball on the pads, turned towards midwicket
pitching well outside leg, Younis glances it towards short fine leg
keeps it on a length, pitching on middle, defended towards midwicket
on the leg stump this time, clipped to square leg by Misbah
down the leg side, Younis sweeps it to short fine leg
tossed up by Murali, pitching on middle and turning into the batsman, massive appeal from Murali for lbw, but that looked to be missing leg
back of a length on offstump, Misbah shuffles across and turns it behind square leg
same length but on middle and leg, defended back down the pitch by Younis
Younis Khan joins the procession, Sri Lanka are well on top here, a short and wide delivery gets the wicket again, Younis cuts it straight to third man
length ball on middle and off, gets behind the line and defends it back to the bowler
good delivery from Thushara, in the channel outside off, Misbah shoulders arms

length ball heading for middle, Misbah is struck on the pads, and Thushara belts out a massive appeal, that was pitching outside leg though, umpire de Silva isn't interested, he's had a good game today
full toss way outside off, Fawad reaches across and slaps it back towards the bowler
Fawad gets forward and tips it towards the off side
turns sharply after pitching outside off, Fawad lets it through to the keeper
flighted by Murali, again well outside off, again Fawad is content to not offer a stroke
flatter and quicker, outside off, Fawad shoulders arms again
full and closer to the stumps this time, Fawad turns it towards midwicket for a single
back of a length and outside off, Fawad lets it through to the keeper
again it was wide outside off, Fawad is tired of letting it through to the keeper, swings at it but misses
just outside off, Fawad gets behind the line and dabs it towards point for a single
back of a length and on middle stump, Misbah pulls it towards midwicket
way outside off again, Fawad is content to leave that one for the keeper
a touch closer to the stumps, short ball, Fawad chops it towards point
on middle and leg, worked towards square leg
shifts to an offstump line this time, turned towards mid-on
shortish and just outside off, Misbah gets on the back foot and defends towards cover
full and on the pads, flicked towards square leg
outside off, defended towards short third man
Fawad gets his front foot across as he plays an offstump delivery, an inside edge onto the pads
outside off stump and that one is left alone by Fawad
and again, well outside off, Fawad shoulders arms
this one is closer to the stumps, it's short, Fawad gets on the back foot and hacks it towards point
back of a length and pitching on middle, Misbah gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
fuller and just outside off, Misbah lunges at it, gets it off the inside half of the bat towards midwicket
ends the over with a bouncer outside off, Misbah sways out of the way
full delivery on leg stump, swept towards deep backward square leg
length ball, pitching on off and going on with the angle, mistimed towards midwicket by Misbah
length ball on the pads, chipped towards midwicket by Fawad
the doosra from Murali, cut away past backward point by Misbah
tossed up by Murali, close to the offstump, Fawad cuts it to backward point
way down the leg side, Fawad gets some bat on it, sending it towards fine leg for a single
starts with an outside off delivery, left alone by Fawad
back of a length delivery on the pads, nudged towards fine leg by Fawad
length ball just outside off, pushed towards mid-on off the front foot
played with soft hands by Misbah, steers the ball towards backward point, a diving stop by the fielder there
this time Misbah gets the single, guiding the ball behind backward point
length ball on off stump, Fawad defends off the front foot
Murali gives that one some air, full outside off, turned to square leg by Misbah
full toss on off stump, punched towards long-on by Misbah
more flight from Murali, another full toss, blocked back by Fawad
overpitched outside off, slapped towards mid-off for a single

another soft dismissal, Misbah's gone this time just as Pakistan seemed to be re-building, straighter one does the trick, pitched on a length just outside leg, Misbah looked to slip it to the leg side, gets a leading edge which lobs back to the bowler
full and pitching just outside off, nudges it toward mid-on
starts with a length ball on offstump, Fawad dabs it towards point
short and a touch wide outside off, defended towards mid-off
pitched short and was wide outside off, Fawad cuts it for a single
Razzaq blocks this one back to the bowler
overpitched on the pads, driven firmly back to the bowler
overpitched outside off, Fawad punches it down to long-on
Fawad drops it towards cover and looks for the single, decides against it
doosra from Murali, Fawad gets an inside edge towards backward square leg
Razzaq defends watchfully towards the covers, sets off for a single immediately
full, on middle and leg, Fawad had got his front foot too far across and had to adjust, he pushes it towards midwicket
cut off the back foot through the covers for a couple
Razzaq stays on the back foot and turns a fullish ball towards backward square leg
Razzaq defends the first ball towards the leg side
this time he plays it with soft hands towards point, gets a single for his efforts
full and outside off, Fawad drives it down to long-off for a single
Razzaq shows the full face of the bat as he blocks it back down the pitch
blocked towards the leg side this time
Jayasuriya keeps firing the ball in, this time Razzaq turns it towards square leg, another dot ball
length ball outside off, Fawad powers it towards covers, doesn't beat the fielder
digs in the bouncer, not too well directed, down the leg side and that is deemed a wide
that could have been tight, Fawad slapped it off the back foot towards mid-off, Kulasekara didn't collect the ball cleanly after charging in as the batsmen steal a tight single
a bit of width for Razzaq, he guides it uppishly towards third man
length ball on middle, Fawad clips it towards midwicket for a single
back of a length, in the channel outside off, left alone by Razzaq
similar delivery from Mathews, Razzaq lifts the bat high over his head as he leaves the ball to the keeper
full and outside off, defended towards cover off the front foot
Fawad rocks onto the backfoot and punches it down the ground, and beats a diving Jayasuriya
on the pads, Razzaq looks to play it to square leg, misses and is struck on the pads outside leg
watchfully defended towards mid-off
a bit of width for Fawad, who goes for the cut and misses
on the pads this time, Fawad can't get it away, defending towards the leg side
short and wide, Razzaq blasts that over the point fielder for a boundary, Pakistan need more of those
back of a length and angling into the pads, defended towards the leg side
gets on the front foot and punches it towards cover
close to the offstump, Razzaq shoulders arms to that one
length ball angling into the offstump, driven towards extra cover by Razzaq
length ball just outside off, Fawad shuffles across and blocks it towards mid-off
flighted delivery on the stumps, Razzaq drives it to midwicket
down the leg side, hits the pads on the way to the keeper
defended towards the covers this time
down the leg side this time, Faawad goes for the sweep and misses
arm ball from Jayasuriya, Fawad is beaten as looks to defend
back of a length delivery, driven firmly to covers
a square drive from Razzaq this time, fetches him a single
Fawad shows the full face of the bat as he blocks a full ball on middle stump
back of a length, sliding down leg, Fawad plays it towards midwicket
length delivery on middle and leg, Fawad defends it back down the pitch
Fawad defends towards mid-off and sets off for a run, Razzaq responds but is sent back after he down a few paces
length ball on middle and off, turned towards midwicket for a single
overpitched on middle and off, Fawad rocks back and punches to mid-off
on the pads, flicked towards midwicket
heading for offstump, Razzaq blocks off the back foot
more defence from Razzaq, this time off the front foot, to the right of the bowler
ends the over with a forward defensive, back to the bowler this time
pushed off the front foot towards mid-off, Razzaq wanted the single but is sent back by Fawad
length ball, strikes Fawad on the pads outside leg, Mathews appeals but he knows that's not going to hit the stumps
overpitched, driven firmly down the ground, that's a boundary Pakistan dearly needed
that's another four for Fawad, this was a legstump gift from Mathews, all Fawad had to do was get it past the short fine leg
angling across the batsman, left alone by Fawad
short of a length ball, outside off, pushed towards short cover
full and angling into off, Razzaq defends it to the leg side
a bit of width and he drives that towards the covers
Fawad takes his eyes off the ball as he lap sweeps the ball from middle stump, connects well with it though
arm ball from Jayasuriya does the job, Fawad is gone, he was on the front foot trying to push that to the off side, nicks it to the keeper, and that could well be the end of Pakistan's chances
Gul gets an inside egde towards short fine leg
full and wide outside off, Gul goes for an ill-advised swipe across the line, doesn't connect
goes down the leg side, and Murali is lucky that it is not  deemed a wide
Murali strikes with the second ball of this spell, pitching on middle and off and turning in, Razzaq was caught on the back foot looking to turn the ball towards the leg side, no doubt about that one
Aamer lets his first delivery in ODIs through to the keeper
doosra from Murali, Aamer gets forward and smother the ball with his defence
flighted from Murali, crashed past mid-off by Aamer

Aamer mows this one from well outside off to midwicket, Mathews makes good ground and manages to stop the ball just short of the rope,  several replays needed to ensure he hadn't touched the rope as he stopped the ball
Malinga starts with a low full toss on off stump, Gul jams it towards short cover
the bouncer this time, Aamer stands tall on the back foot and defends towards the off side
another bouncer, this time outside off, Aamer goes for the cut but doesn't connect
very full, outside leg, Aamer had backed away and is struck on the boot just outside leg
a fast yorker on middle, 141 kmh, Aamer defends with the full face of the bat
this one is short and way down the leg side, he'll have to bowl that one again
slower yorker this time, 119 kmh, on middle and leg, Aamer squeezes it out towards cover
on the pads, Aamer bends his knees and sweeps it to fine leg, scampers back for the second
Aamer looks to swipe it to midwicket, gets a thick edge which Sangakkara can't collect, runs away for a couple to third man
defended off the front foot towards point
looks to swing to midwicket, doesn't quite get hold of it, the ball rolls towards square leg
straighter one from Murali pitching just outside off, Gul is confounded by that, it was pretty quick as well, 92 kmh
swept from outside off for a boundary, there were some cries of 'Catch it' as it went uppishly, but it landed safely
bouncer just outside off, Aamer dabs it down to third man for a single
yorker, 141.6 kmh, on offstump, jammed towards mid-on for a single
overpitched on the pads, glanced down to fine leg for a single
low full toss outside off, sliced towards mid-on
full and on the pads, Gul wanted to swing that to deep square leg, misses and is hit on the pad outside the leg stump
overpitched outside off, and that one is blasted though the covers for a boundary
short, outside off and turning away from Aamer, who cuts it behind square, a tight single is taken, third umpire is needed to ensure Aamer made his ground
big turn for Murali, Gul nudges it to square leg
goes on straight this time, pitching outside leg, Aamer backs away and works it towards square leg
Gul takes a couple of paces coming down the track and punches the ball towards long-on
overpitched on the pads, Aamer gives himself room and swings it against the spin, it bounces just inside the rope near midwicket

Aamer goes for a repeat of the previous stroke, mishits it, and the ball balloons towards square leg, Sangakkara races to make the catch and puts in a dive as well but can't hang on to it, that was a difficult chance
full toss on the pads, Gul flicks it to the square leg boundary, runs starting to flow now for Pakistan
another boundary for Gul, this time to the cover boundary, fullish ball outside off, Gul crashes it through the covers
Malinga replies with the quick bouncer, it's outside off and Gul is not bothered by that one

Gul plays the sort of shot that got led to Afridi's dismissal, a bouncer outside off, Gul cheekily upper cuts it over short third man and that's the third boundary of the over, and that's a no-ball as it's the second high bouncer of the over
more frustration for Sri Lanka, slower ball on a length, heading for offstump, Gul gets an outside edge past the keeper and too fine for the third man, that's the 50 partnership
short and very wide outside off, Malinga will have to bowl that again
another bouncer, Gul goes for the pull and misses, is hit on the body and runs away to fine leg
back of length, on the leg stump, turned to fine leg for a single
short and wide, dabbed to third man by Thushara
length ball on middle and leg, Gul swings it around to midwicket, Jayasuriya has to run around to cut it off
short and well outside off, Aamer stands tall and looks to cut it past point but can't beat the man
very short and wide, Aamer plays that fine past the keeper to get another boundary
pitched up by Thushara, outside off, left alone by Aamer
length ball ball outside off, left alone by Aamer, umpire deems it a 'wide', Sangakkara is unhappy with the decision
similar ball from Thushara, wider outside off this time, another free run for Pakistan
pitched up, well outside off, driven firmly to point, that's a dot ball
length ball on off, Gul strikes it towards sweeper cover like a top-order batsman
keeps it full and on middle, Aamer defends with the full face of the bat

Aamer jabs a fullish delivery to backward point and is run out, Jayawardene has done the job for Sri Lanka, the bowlers were struggling to break the partnership, but Jayawardene throws down the stumps at the bowler's end with a direct hit, Aamer forgets to drag his bat into the crease and that error means he doesn't make his ground, he has to go
that's the end of that, Malinga gets the perfect yorker on middle and leg, Gul misses, the stumps are shattered, Sri Lanka are 1-0 up in this series
